com.cmput301w13t09.cmput301project.models

Class IngredientModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w13t09.cmput301project.models.IngredientModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class IngredientModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Kyle,Marcus,Landre Class: ingredientModel ingredientModel is a class that stores information about a ingredient used in recipes. ingredientModel stores the name (ingredient_name) and description (ingredient_desc) of an ingredient. ingredientModels constructor takes in a name and description (desc). ingredientModel contains the methods getingredientName() and getingredientDesc().
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
